ESPublicQuery.SQL: SELECT ESFITradeAccountContract.Code AS Code, ESFITradeAccountContract.Description AS Description FROM ESFITradeAccountContract AS ESFITradeAccountContract WHERE (ESFITradeAccountContract.fCompanyCode = ##(ESCOMPANY)) AND (ESFITradeAccountContract.Inactive = 0) AND (ESEqual(ESFITradeAccountContract.Code, @Code))
